definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: intrans. and pass. (Ar. wasi9a be capacious, II. make wide, spacious, IV. make sufficient, V. VIII. be or live in abundance (v. Dr:1Sa 14:45) Ph. n.pr. [[ישע]]; Sab. [[יתַע]] (royal epith.), n.pr. [[אליתַע]], [[יתַעאל]], [[עמיתַע]], e.g. Mordt:ZMG 1876, 87; 1893, 409. 416. 417, etc. (yet note strange equiv., [[תַ]] = s); not in Aram.; MI:4 [[השעני]] he delivered me, l:3 [[משע]]([[ב]]) deliverance, Sm and So, (but [[במת]] ClGann Dr); n.pr.m. [[משע]] l:1, also l:3 [4] Sm and So, but [[ישע]] deliverance, ClGann Dr)—

be liberated, saved (prop. placed in freedom; cf. for the fig. [[הִרְחִיב]], [[מֶרְחָב]]), from external evils Pr 28:18, by God Is 30:15, Is 45:22, Is 64:4, Je 4:14, Je 8:20, Je 17:14, Je 23:6, Je 33:16, Ps 80:4, Ps 80:8, Ps 80:20, Ps 119:117; with [[מִן]], Je 30:7; [[מֵאׂיְבִים]] Nu 10:9 (P), 2Sa 22:4 = Ps 18:4.
be saved in battle, victorious Zec 9:9, Ps 33:16 + 1Sa 14:47 v. supr.; [[עַם נוֹשַׁע ביהוה]] De 33:29 a people victorious in ´[[י]] (poem), cf. Is 45:17.

deliver, save (prop. give width and breadth to, liberate), in peril, c. acc. pers. velloc. Ex 2:17 (E) Ju Jdg 6:31, 1Sa 23:2, 1Sa 23:5, 2Sa 10:19 = 1Ch 19:19, 2Ki 6:27, 2Ki 6:27, Ps 36:7, Ps 72:18, Job 26:2; with [[לְ]] pers. Jos 10:6 (E) De 22:27, Ju Jdg 10:14, 2Sa 10:11 = 1Ch 19:12 (with acc.), Je 11:12, Je 11:12, Ps 72:4, Ps 116:6; abs. [[הוֹשִׁיעָה הַמֶּלֶח]] Help, O king 2Sa 14:4, 2Ki 6:26. Specif. save, from evils and troubles :

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of heroic men, saving the nation in war Ju Jdg 3:31, Jdg 6:15, Jdg 10:1, 1Sa 10:27, Ho 13:10, Je 14:9; these are named [[מוֹשִׁיעַ]] saviour Ju Jdg 3:9, Jdg 3:15, 2Ki 13:5, Is 19:20, Ob:Ob 21, Ne 9:27; phr. when they are lacking [[אֵין מוֹשִׁיעַ]] Ju Jdg 12:3, 1Sa 11:3, 2Sa 22:42 = Ps 18:42, De 28:29, De 28:31, Is 47:15; they save [[מִיַּד]] from the hand of Ju Jdg 2:16, Jdg 8:22, Jdg 12:2, Jdg 13:5, 1Sa 9:16, Ne 9:27; [[מכף]] Ju Jdg 6:14, 1Sa 4:3, 2Ki 16:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, who saves his people from external evils De 20:4, Jos 22:22, Ju Jdg 3:9, Jdg 6:36, Jdg 6:37, Jdg 7:7, Jdg 10:13, 1Sa 14:23, 1Sa 14:39, 2Ki 14:27, 2Ki 19:34 = Is 37:35, Is 25:9, Is 33:22, Is 35:4, Is 43:12, Is 49:25, Is 63:9, Je 31:7, Ez Eze 34:22, Ho 1:7, Ho 1:7, Hb Hab 1:2, Zep 3:17, Zep 3:19, Zec 8:7, Zec 8:13, Zec 9:16, Zec 10:6, Zec 12:7, Ps 28:9, Ps 69:36, Ps 106:8, Ps 118:25, 2Ch 20:9; or the pious among them Is 38:20, Je 2:27, Je 17:14, Ps 3:8, Ps 6:5, Ps 7:2, Ps 31:17, Ps 54:3, Ps 55:17, Ps 57:4, Ps 69:2, Ps 71:2, Ps 71:3, Ps 106:47 = 1Ch 16:35, Ps 109:26, Ps 119:94, Ps 119:146, Ps 138:7, Pr 20:22; and especially the king Ps 20:7, Ps 20:9; David 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:14; thy servant Ps 86:2, Ps 86:16; [[חסיד]] Ps 12:2; [[דַּכְּאֵי־רוּחַ]] Ps 34:19; [[חדיקים]] Ps 37:40; [[חוֹסִים]] Ps 17:7; ´[[יראי י]] Ps 145:19; [[י]] Ps 18:28 = 2Sa 22:28; [[עַנְוֵי־אֶרֶץ]] Ps 76:10; [[ישׁרי לב]] Ps 7:11; [[שַׁח עֵינַיִם]] Job 22:29; accordingly God is [[מוֹשִׁיעַ]] saviour Is 43:11, Is 45:15, Is 45:21, Is 63:8, Ho 13:4; [[משִׁעִי]] 2Sa 22:3; [[מוֹשִׁיעָם]] Ps 106:21; [[מוֹשִׁיעוֹ]] Je 14:8; [[מוֹשִׁיעְֲ]] Is 43:3, Is 49:26, Is 60:16, Je 30:10 = Je 46:27; is with his people [[לְהוֹשִׁיעַ]] Je 15:20, Je 30:11, Je 42:11; [[רַב לְהוֹשִׁיעַ]] Is 63:1; [[בֵּית מְחוּדוֹת לְהוֹשִׁיעֵנִי]] Ps 31:3; Isr. prays [[הוֹשִׁיעָה יְמִינְְ]] O save with thy right hand Ps 60:7 = Ps 108:7, cf. Is 59:1; that fr.wh. one is saved constr. c. [[מִן]]:[[מִיַּד ]] Ex 14:30 (J) Ju Jdg 2:18, Jdg 10:12, 1Sa 7:8, 2Sa 3:18, 2Ki 19:19 = Is 37:20, Ps 106:10, 2Ch 32:22; [[מֵחָמָס]] 2Sa 22:3; [[מֵחֶרֶב]] Job 5:15: [[מִכָּל־חָרוֹת]] Ps 34:7; [[מִכָּל־רָעוֹת]] 1Sa 10:19; [[מִצָּרֵינוּ]] Ps 44:8; [[מִפִּי אַרְיֵה]] Ps 22:22; [[מִשּׁׂפְטֵי נַפְשׁוֹ]] Ps 109:31; [[מֵאַנְשֵׁי דָמִים]] Ps 59:3; [[מִמְּחוּקוֹת]] Ps 107:13, Ps 107:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: there is no other salvation, the sword saves not Ps 44:7, or a nation La 4:17, or astrologers Is 47:13, or Asshur Ho 14:4, or other gods Is 45:20, Is 46:7, Je 2:28.
save from moral troubles, only in Ez. [[מִכּׂל מוֹשְׁבׂחֵיחֶם]] (rd., with Co Da al., [[מְשׁוּבוֹתֵיהֶם]]) Eze 37:23; [[מִכּׂל טֻמְאוֹתֵיכֶם]] Eze 36:29.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of man, c. [[לְ]] pers., give victory to, c. agent subj. [[יַד]] Ju Jdg 7:2, 1Sa 25:26, 1Sa 25:33, [[יַד]] om. v:1Sa 25:31; [[יַמִין]] Job 40:14; [[זְרוֹעַ]] Ps 44:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, with [[לְ]] pers., subj. [[יׇמִין]] Psalm Is 59:16, Is 63:5; Yahweh 1Ch 18:6, with acc. v:1Ch 18:13; abs. gain victory 1Sa 14:6, 1Sa 17:47; [[וַיּוֹשַׁע תְּשׁוּעָה גְדוֹלָה]] 1Ch 11:14.
